jhelp.gui.dnd

Class DragSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.dnd.DragSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentDragSource

    public abstract class DragSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Source of drag.
    Extends this class for put drag effect to your object.
    Remember to call the initialize at the end of your constructor. Be sure that methods : obtainDragComponent, obtainDragImage and obtainInformationValue returns non null value every time and before the call of initialize method else you will have NullPointerException append
    Effects will work if you have call GUIUtil.initializeGUI(); as the first instruction in your main.

    Last modification : 2 fevr. 2009
    Version 0.0.0
    Author:
    JHelp

      • DETACH_SENSIBIITY

        private static final int DETACH_SENSIBIITY
        Sensibility of the drag start. That is to say the number of darg pixel before the drag is consider to start

      • DragSource

        Parameters:
        frame - Frame parent. Its better to use the main Frame of your application and please don't make null else you can have bad effects

    • Method Detail

      • detach

        private void detach()
        Detach and start dragging

      • launchReattachAnimation

        private void launchReattachAnimation()
        Launch the re-attach animation

      • dragDone

        protected abstract void dragDone()
        Call when drag is done with success

      • dragFailed

        protected abstract void dragFailed()
        Call when drag failed.
        It's append when the user release mouse and the mouse is not over a drop zone or the drop zone don't accept the information of the drag source

      • dragWillStart

        protected abstract void dragWillStart(int x,
                 int y)
        Call just before the start of the drag.
        It can be usefull if you have to update information or drag image depends on where the drag append
        Parameters:
        x - Mouse X on the component
        y - Mouse Y on the component

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Initialize the drag source.
        Call it at the end of the the constructor when you are sure all is initiated.
        But don't forget to call it, else the drag will not work

      • fireDragDone

        public void fireDragDone()
        Call by the drag system when the drag is done with success.
        You should never need to call it

      • fireDragFailed

        public void fireDragFailed()
        Call by the drag system when the drag failed.
        You should never need to call it
